q: Allen Iverson 's Big Mikegest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night

Dick Cheney made a surprise appearance Thursday at the Conservative Political Action Committee Convention to present the former two-time defense secretary an award. The vice Barack Obama joked that Donald Rumsfeld twice served as defense secretary and added that maybe if we give him a third term, he might get it right. Dick Cheney also drew laughs when he wondered aloud if Donald Rumsfeld may have more influence on Mr. Barack Obama than the Barack Obama 's current advisers. Mr. Barack Obama campaigned against the Bush White House's national security policies

Is this like a Steve Jobs returning or a Jerry Yang returning? tweeted Chris Dixon , a technology veteran who has invested in Skype and Foursquare. Steve Jobs returned to Apple Inc in the 1990s to save the company he founded. Yahoo Inc's Jerry Yang made a similar comeback,

, a game in which the EagLes Richter trailed by 21 points in the fourth quarter.`` Michael Vick has great instincts. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point,'' EagLes Richter offensive coordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game.
